SENT.plain: We performed the modified Bentall procedure for annuloaortic ectasia in a 41-year-old man with Marfan's syndrome

Approximately 15 minutes after initiation of cardiopulmonary bypass with an arterial delivery via the left common femoral artery, perfusion volume gradually decreased and the abdomen of the patient was distended
Perforation and localized dissection of the left common iliac artery were recognized
Following repair of the lesion, the modified Bentall operation was carried out
The patient has been well for 22 months after the operation
